vendor_name: Grand View Villa at Mount Martha
title: Mount Martha Beach House for up to Eight Guests on the Mornington Peninsula
description:
Situated on the charming Mornington Peninsula, Grand View Villa at Mount Martha offers spectacular Port Phillip Bay views from this multi-level house with enough room for up to nine guests. A spacious sanctuary featuring four beautifully decorated bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, living and dining spaces and a covered deck with uninterrupted vistas, this recently renovated house is the perfect getaway for families and groups. Take a walk through the gated gardens, laugh late into the evening in the games room or relax undisturbed and enjoy the striking bay views.

While the location promises a tranquil stay, the best of the region is still at your fingertips. Breathe in the fresh sea air on your doorstep and cool off with a day on the beach, just a three-minute drive away. Within a 30-minute drive, youâ€™ll also be able to pamper yourself at Victoria's first natural thermal mineral springs and day spa or escape to the hinterland for award-winning wineries and innovative local cuisine at fantastic eateries and local markets.
location_description: Grand View Villa at Mount Martha
